CLAUDE CODE ANALYSIS
Query: What patterns emerge in how Gulfstream communicated estimate changes?

RELEVANT DOCUMENT EXCERPTS:

[Mike Brown (FAZ) Direct Outline with Redirect & Rehab.docx, p.1]
No, but analysis based on regular booking patterns and prior demand—standard in aviation charter modeling.

[Mike Brown (FAZ) Direct Outline with Redirect & Rehab.docx, p.1]
Is it common practice to project profits using historical patterns?

[Mike Brown (FAZ) Direct Outline with Redirect & Rehab.docx, p.1]
A. That’s correct, not every flight was pre-booked—but my model was based on the historical booking cadence and utilization patterns of the aircraft.

[NO exhibits - CITIOM EXPERT REPORT - D. Farnham Expert Report - Mar 21 2025 copy.pdf, p.14]
Weekend and “Skeleton Crew” Issues: Because of these shift patterns, I often found

[3. Mike Brown (FAZ) Direct Outline with Redirect & Rehab.docx, p.1]
A: No. I used historical booking patterns from 2022 and 2023, which showed consistent utilization. It’s standard in aviation to model expected charter income based on those usage trends, not on hypothetical pre-bookings.

[Danny Farnham Direct Outline with Cross & Redirect.docx, p.1]
The core structure, inspection triggers, and typical findings—especially corrosion patterns—are known quantities.

[CITIOM EXPERT REPORT - D. Farnham Expert Report - Mar 21 2025.pdf, p.14]
Weekend and “Skeleton Crew” Issues: Because of these shift patterns, I often found

[111-206.pdf, p.49]
8.1 CUSTOMER ITEM: OE-LlM-231027-2 CHECK >EMERGENCY GEAR BODLE FOR LEAKS - SUSPECT LEAKING DUE TO SERVICING REQUIRED MORE FREQUENT.

[1-66.pdf, p.20]
Care must also be taken if/when the emergency egress windows are

[Patrick Stockton Outline #1.docx, p.1]
If a paint delay emerges, you are expected to notify the originating facility.

[Gulfstream - Prehearing Brief .pdf, p.59]

[Gulfstream - Prehearing Brief .pdf, p.60]
